1.name: JK Flip-Flop
1.description: A JK flip-flop is a bistable multivibrator with two inputs J and K that control the state changes.

2.name: D Flip-Flop
2.description: A D flip-flop is a digital electronic circuit used to store one bit of data.

3.name: SR Latch
3.description: An SR latch (Set-Reset latch) is a bistable multivibrator with two inputs, S and R.
